All functions

analyze_outbreaks()
Analyze outbreak characteristics
animate_spatial_spread()
Create animated spatial plot over time
calculate_R0()
Calculate basic reproduction number (R0) for different model types
calculate_equilibrium()
Calculate equilibrium values for deterministic models
calculate_force_of_infection()
Calculate force of infection over time
calculate_outbreak_metrics()
Calculate outbreak summary statistics
calculate_spatial_correlation()
Calculate spatial correlation in infection levels

Load plague model scenario parameters

Calculate model statistics
model
Plague odin.dust models This is an odin.dust model.

Create a plague_results object

Plot compartment dynamics with uncertainty bands

Plot sensitivity analysis results
